chart.name: chart.my.purchase.per.product.family.volume
chart.title: My purchased qty by product accounting family
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.qty) AS _qty, product.productFamily.name AS _product_family FROM PurchaseOrderLine self, Product product
WHERE self.product = product AND DATE(self.purchaseOrder.validationDateTime) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.purchaseOrder.validationDateTime) <= DATE(:toDate) AND self.purchaseOrder.statusSelect > 3 AND self.purchaseOrder.statusSelect < 6 AND self.purchaseOrder.buyerUser = :__user__ AND self.purchaseOrder.company = :activeCompany GROUP BY product.productFamily.name ORDER BY product.productFamily.name

chart.name: chart.my.purchase.amount.per.product.family
chart.title: My purchased amount by product accounting family
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.exTaxTotal) AS amount, product.productFamily.name AS _product_family FROM PurchaseOrderLine self, Product product
WHERE self.purchaseOrder.buyerUser = :__user__ AND self.purchaseOrder.company = :activeCompany AND DATE(self.purchaseOrder.validationDateTime) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.purchaseOrder.validationDateTime) <= DATE(:toDate) AND self.purchaseOrder.createdOn <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND self.purchaseOrder.statusSelect IN (4,5) AND self.product = product GROUP BY product.productFamily.name ORDER BY product.productFamily.name

chart.name: chart.purchase.order.volume.by.buyer.by.family
chart.title: POs Volume by buyer by accounting family
chart.dataset: select sum(_line.qty) as qty, buyer.full_name buyer_name, family.name as family_name FROM purchase_purchase_order_line _line JOIN purchase_purchase_order self ON _line.purchase_order=self.id JOIN auth_user _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND self.company = _user.active_company JOIN auth_user buyer ON buyer.id=self.buyer_user JOIN base_product product ON product.id=_line.product JOIN base_product_family family ON product.product_family=family.id where DATE(self.validation_date_time) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.validation_date_time) <= DATE(:toDate) AND self.status_select in(4,5) group by buyer_name, family_name

chart.name: chart.purchase.order.amount.by.family
chart.title: Purchased amount by accounting family
chart.dataset: SELECT family.name as family_name, coalesce(sum(self.ex_tax_total) ,0) as amount FROM purchase_purchase_order_line orders JOIN purchase_purchase_order self ON self.id=orders.purchase_order JOIN auth_user _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND self.company = _user.active_company JOIN base_product product ON product.id=orders.product JOIN base_product_family family ON product.product_family=family.id WHERE self.status_select in(4,5) AND DATE(self.validation_date_time) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.validation_date_time) <= DATE(:toDate) GROUP BY family_name

chart.name: chart.purchase.order.amount.distribution.by.family
chart.title: Purchased amount distribution by accounting family
chart.dataset:
SELECT
base_product_family.name AS _family_product, TRUNC((SUM(purchase_purchase_order_line.ex_tax_total) * 100)/(SELECT SUM(purchase_purchase_order_line.ex_tax_total) FROM purchase_purchase_order self JOIN auth_user _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND self.company = _user.active_company LEFT JOIN purchase_purchase_order_line ON purchase_purchase_order_line.purchase_order = self.id WHERE DATE(self.validation_date_time) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.validation_date_time) <= DATE(:toDate) AND self.status_select IN (4,5)),2) AS _percent FROM purchase_purchase_order self JOIN auth_user _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND self.company = _user.active_company LEFT JOIN purchase_purchase_order_line ON purchase_purchase_order_line.purchase_order = self.id LEFT JOIN base_product ON base_product.id = purchase_purchase_order_line.product LEFT JOIN base_product_family ON base_product_family.id = base_product.product_family WHERE DATE(self.validation_date_time) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.validation_date_time) <= DATE(:toDate) AND self.status_select IN (4,5) GROUP BY base_product_family.name ORDER BY base_product_family.name

chart.name: chart.total.purchase.amount
chart.title: Total Purchased Amount by month
chart.dataset: SELECT to_char(_order.validation_date_time,'yyyy-MM') AS _month, SUM(_order.ex_tax_total) AS _amount FROM purchase_purchase_order AS _order JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND _order.company = _user.active_company WHERE DATE(_order.validation_date_time) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND _order.status_select IN (4,5) GROUP BY _month ORDER BY _month

chart.name: chart.total.purchase.qty
chart.title: Total Purchased Qty by month
chart.dataset: SELECT to_char(_order.validation_date_time,'yyyy-MM') AS _month, SUM(_line.qty) AS _qty FROM purchase_purchase_order AS _order JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND _order.company = _user.active_company JOIN purchase_purchase_order_line AS _line ON _order.id = _line.purchase_order WHERE DATE(_order.validation_date_time) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(_order.validation_date_time) <= DATE(:fromDate) + CAST(:monthSelect as int) * INTERVAL '1 month' AND _order.status_select IN (4,5) GROUP BY _month ORDER BY _month

chart.name: chart.nbr.of.po.per.month
chart.title: Nbr of PO by month
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(_order.id) as _orders, to_char(_order.validation_date_time,'yyyy-MM') AS _month FROM purchase_purchase_order AS _order JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ AND _order.company = _user.active_company WHERE DATE(_order.validation_date_time) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND _order.status_select IN (4,5) GROUP BY _month ORDER BY _month

chart.name: chart.purchase.amount.per.product.family
chart.title: Purchased amount by product accounting family
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.exTaxTotal) AS amount, product.productFamily.name AS _family_product FROM PurchaseOrder self, PurchaseOrderLine line, Product product
WHERE line.purchaseOrder = self AND line.product = product AND DATE(self.validationDateTime) >= DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(self.validationDateTime) <= DATE(:toDate) AND self.createdOn <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND self.statusSelect > 3 AND self.statusSelect < 6 AND self.company = :activeCompany GROUP BY product.productFamily.name ORDER BY product.productFamily.name
